lead_paragraph: Kinkaid made 30 saves for his second career shutout as the Devils moved within five points of the Penguins for the Eastern Conference’s final playoff spot.

headline.print_headline: Devils Keep Playoff Hopes Alive Behind Keith Kinkaid’s Shutout
headline.main: Devils Keep Playoff Hopes Alive Behind Keith Kinkaid’s Shutout

snippet: Kinkaid made 30 saves for his second career shutout as the Devils moved within five points of the Penguins for the Eastern Conference’s final playoff spot.
